title: Stopping Frank Gore, Colts ground game critical for Saints - The Advocate
text: Stopping Frank Gore, Colts ground game critical for Saints Stopping Frank Gore, Colts ground game critical for Saints Associated Press photo by Bill Wippert -- Colts running back Frank Gore is 10th in the NFL with 403 yards on 89 carries, an average of 4.5 yards. Associated Press photo by Michael ConroyColts running back Frank Gore is 10th in the NFL with 403 rushing yards on 89 carries, an average of 4.5 yards per carry. Indianapolis Colts running back Frank Gore (23) runs the ball in the first half of an NFL football game against the New York Jets in Indianapolis, Monday, Sept. 21, 2015. (AP Photo/AJ Mast) Forcing Indianapolis pass creates opportunities for defense Joel a. Erickson | jerickson@theadvocate.com
